about.metaDescription: Everything you need to know about top-x: the platform for viral challenges, ego-based games, and current affairs fun.
about.who.title: Who are we?
about.who.p1: Top-X is a platform for viral games and challenges. Here you can create, play, compete and share your own mini-games and activities.
about.who.p2: We live on the pulse of X: connecting to what's happening now, social media storms, trends, rankings and comparisons.
about.who.p3: The challenges on Top-X are like live reality memes, breathing and kicking current affairs. We've taken everything people already do in the feed - arguments, trash-talk, "who has it bigger" comparisons, and turned it into ego-based fun.
about.who.p4: The platform was built 97% by Grok ü§ñ with vibe-coding. Yes, it's a sensation!
about.what.title: What do we do here?
about.what.subtitle: Play. Compete. Rate. Show off or hide.
about.what.list.1: Challenges, activities and rankings (like our hysterical Tweeters Pyramid. Who's at the top and who's at the bottom?)
about.what.list.2: Interesting results and statistics (like - what is the favorite food in Israel?)
about.what.list.3: Casual games (like Pacman, area closers, runners and more).
about.what.list.4: Analysis tools and surveys (working on it).
about.what.list.5: Challenging quizzes, questionnaires and trivia games (like - who is the smartest on Twitter? Which Seinfeld character are you? Are you a narcissist?)
about.what.list.6: Top Charts that show exactly where you are relative to others.
about.what.list.7: Cool technological tools (like AI game creation - later).
about.what.footer: And the coolest part - you have the access to create everything from scratch or from a template, a game or challenge of your own! You can send it to friends, challenge the network or go viral.
about.how.title: How do we do it?
about.how.p1: Just enter, play or create your own challenge, and share. Share on X and let the feed do its thing...
about.why.title: Why should I connect?
about.why.subtitle: Connecting to X unlocks advanced features:
about.why.list.1: Your votes are counted in the results (to prevent double voting)
about.why.list.3: Ability to appear in the Top Charts and flex on the network
about.why.list.4: Comparison to friends and enemies' achievements
about.why.list.5: Ability to add friends or rivals for tracking
about.why.list.7: Ability to create and save new challenges
about.why.list.9: Badges and usage documentation for challenges you uploaded
about.why.footer: For early access to new challenges - we recommend following @topxisrael
about.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
about.faq.a1: Yes. The games and challenges are free. Both playing and creating.
about.faq.q2: Do I need an X account?
about.faq.a2: Not for playing. Yes for saving achievements, comparing with friends, appearing on leaderboards and creating challenges.
about.faq.q3: Can I suggest a game idea?
about.faq.a3: Of course. Any troll can easily create their own games and challenges from our existing templates. We add templates all the time. If you are a developer - you can also submit games, challenges or new templates yourself. Talk to us.
about.faq.q4: Have feedback, an idea or collaboration?
about.faq.a4: Talk to us: contact@top-x.co or send a DM to @topxisrael. Let's build the next big thing together! üèÜ
about.closing.title: Is it serious or a joke?
about.closing.addictive: Is it going to be addictive?
about.closing.footer: Enough talking. Ready to go to the next level?
why-connect.hero.title: Why should I connect?
why-connect.hero.subtitle: Because without connection - it's just nonsense. Only with connection - it's a real experience.
why-connect.main.p1: To maintain fair play, prevent duplicate votes, and enable real ratings -
why-connect.main.p2: We need to know you're you, not a bot or someone trying to skew results.
why-connect.skeptics.title: Are you one of the suspicious ones?
why-connect.skeptics.subtitle: Paranoid? Suspicious? Allergic to 'Connect with X'?
why-connect.skeptics.body: We totally understand. We are too.
why-connect.truth.title: So here's the whole truth, no small print:
why-connect.truth.bullet1: üîç We only take public info: like username, name and profile picture. The most we could go is to display follower-following count and bio.
why-connect.truth.bullet2: üö´ We have no permission to post on your behalf.
why-connect.truth.bullet3: ü§ê We cannot read messages, we don't touch the feed and we don't do shenanigans behind your back.
why-connect.truth.bullet4: üôÑ And even if we could - we wouldn't do it. Seriously.
why-connect.purpose.title: The connection is meant for one thing only:
why-connect.purpose.body: To ensure fair play, personal, and that you're you. And to allow full experience of saving things you've done, adding friends, appearing in Top Charts etc.
why-connect.benefits.title: So what do I get from this?
why-connect.benefits.subtitle: Connecting to X opens advanced features:
why-connect.benefits.list.1: ‚úÖ Your votes count towards results (no duplicate votes).
why-connect.benefits.list.2: ‚úèÔ∏è Save challenges for editing and continued play.
why-connect.benefits.list.4: ü§º‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Compare achievements with friends, and enemies‚Ä¶
why-connect.benefits.list.9: üéñÔ∏è Badges and documentation of challenges you've created.
why-connect.summary.title: In short:
why-connect.summary.body: Without connection you're watching. Troll. Suspected as Iranian bot.
why-connect.summary.body2: With connection you're a human. You're a player. You're a soul.
why-connect.metaDescription: Learn why connecting with X enhances your TOP-X experience with advanced features and fair play.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your TOP-X Quick Hits üöÄ
faq.intro: We've got answers to crush your doubts - ego-bruising style. U vs X? Dive in, play on, and claim the feed. Questions not covered? Hit us at contact@top-x.co. Who's topping yours? Let's find out! üìà‚öîÔ∏è
faq.metaDescription: Quick hits on TOP-X: Login, privacy, games, and more ego-bruising answers.
faq.items.login.question: Why log in to TOP-X?
faq.items.login.answer: Sign in to unleash the full glory: save your past plays, results & picks, climb leaderboards, spy on friends' picks, and trash-talk rivals. Without it? Fun previews only - no community showdowns or ego boosts. Log in & rise to the challenge! üîë
faq.items.security.question: Is logging in with X secure?
faq.items.security.answer: Absolutely! We use X's ironclad OAuth - minimal access, max privacy. No peeking at DMs, no posting on your behalf. Your data's locked down tighter than a vault in Fort Knox. üîíüí™
faq.items.permissions.question: What X permissions does TOP-X need?
faq.items.permissions.answer: Just the basics: your public profile (username + pic) for personalization - to prevent fakes and duplicate votes. We skip the rest - no private posts, no follows lists. Privacy first, ego-bruises second! üìã
faq.items.permissionPrompt.question: Why does X ask for several permissions?
faq.items.permissionPrompt.answer: X's default prompt is overkill - it's the bare minimum they allow for any app. Stuff like "protected posts" (locked accounts) or "who you follow/block"? We ignore it all. We only snag your username + pic - nothing else touches your feed. Promise: No meddling, no posting, just pure U vs X vibes. Chill & connect! üòé
faq.items.dataProtection.question: How is my data protected?
faq.items.dataProtection.answer: Firebase secures your info with top-tier encryption - minimal collection (just what you share), full privacy compliance. You control it all; we don't sell or snoop. Ego-bruises? Yes. Data drama? Never. üîíüõ°Ô∏è
faq.items.free.question: Is TOP-X free?
faq.items.free.answer: Totally free! All challenges are free. Jump in, play, compete, rank, flex, and top them all without dropping a dime. üÜìüèÜ
faq.items.unique.question: What makes TOP-X unique?
faq.items.unique.answer: We're Grok-powered (99% xAI magic ü§ñ) + human vibe-coded üíñ for that unbeatable edge. We ride trends like pros - weekly drops tailored to X's hottest buzz. Fast, techy, and ego-bruising: Pyramids for GOAT debates, trivia smackdowns, and viral rivalries. No stale games - fresh battles every week! ‚ö°üìà
faq.items.powered.question: What's the deal with "Powered by Grok 99%"?
faq.items.powered.answer: Grok (xAI's powerhouse) built 99% of TOP-X: code, games, content, even marketing sparks. It's like having an AI wizard on speed-dial for trend-riding glory. Humans add the final 1% vibe-code for that human spark. Grok crunches, we perfect the punch! ü§ñüî•
faq.items.vibeCoding.question: What's vibe-coding?
faq.items.vibeCoding.answer: Vibe-coding is our secret sauce: Humans tweaking Grok's 99% AI output for that irresistible feel - cheeky, competitive, trend-connected. It's not just code; it's ego-bruising energy, trash-talk tweaks, and U vs X flair. Grok crunches the tech; we code the vibes. üíñ‚öîÔ∏è
faq.items.games.question: What games & challenges are available?
faq.items.games.answer: Pyramids of glory (rank GOATs like football legends or prez rivalries), trivia takedowns (test your smarts vs the feed), quizzes that bruise egos, and many more mini-games, ego-busters and showdowns. More dropping weekly. Rise, rival, conquer! üéÆüìä
faq.items.howToPlay.question: How do I play & what's recommended?
faq.items.howToPlay.answer: Easy: Pick a challenge (pyramids, trivia, quizzes or other), build/rank/quiz/play away, then share for trash-talk gold. Start with a pyramid - stack your GOATs, log in for leaderboards, follow players for friends/rival peeks. Pro tip: Share everywhere (X, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram) to rally your crew. Top them all! üéØ
faq.items.sharing.question: Can I share my pyramids, results, or game stuff?
faq.items.sharing.answer: Heck yeah - we encourage it! Grab the image, paste our pre-copied text, and flex on X or anywhere. It rallies more players, unlocks community results, and lets you spy who's topping yours. Win-win ego glory! üì∏üèÜ
faq.items.shareWithFriends.question: How do I share with friends?
faq.items.shareWithFriends.answer: Easy ego-flex: Hit the share button after a challenge - it auto-downloads your image (pyramid, trivia score, etc.) and copies custom text. Paste into X, WhatsApp, or anywhere - tag your crew, trash-talk, and rally them to top yours. Pre-loaded with our URL for viral vibes. Share & top 'em all! üì∏üë•
faq.items.noX.question: If I don't have X, what can I do?
faq.items.noX.answer: Open an X account here - Seriously, how do you live without it? üòú It's just two seconds! Or jump in without logging in - half the features (like results, leaderboards, following) won't unlock, but you can still play challenges and share images on other platforms (WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.). Ego-bruise lite mode! üì±
faq.items.follow.question: Why follow @topxapp?
faq.items.follow.answer: For the inside scoop: Weekly drops, RTs of your wins, glory shots (spotlights & scores), and trend alerts. It's your feed's ego-boost HQ - follow @topxapp & stay ahead of the rivalries! üëÄüìå
faq.items.future.question: What's next for TOP-X?
faq.items.future.answer: Grok 4's dropping epic upgrades soon. Weekly challenges synced to X storms: More pyramids, polls, mini games and challenges at the speed of a keystroke. Shaped by your feedback - join the VIP crew for input! We've got tons more surprises in store, but Grok recommends keeping mum for now. Stay tuned & top the future! üöÄüìà
faq.items.whyReading.question: Why am I still reading this FAQ instead of logging in & playing?
faq.items.whyReading.answer: Probably overthinking the ego-bruise... or scared you won't top 'em all? üòè Nah, you're ready - take the leap, sign in securely, and claim the throne. U vs X starts now! Dive into challenges üëâ top-x.co/challenges. Who's on top? You tell us! ‚öîÔ∏è

terms.hero.title: Terms of Use
terms.hero.subtitle: Effective Date: July 17, 2025
terms.sections.1.title: Welcome to TOP-X
terms.sections.1.body: By using our games and services, you agree to follow these terms. TOP-X is built for friendly competition and shared entertainment. Users must be 18+ (or have guardian approval) and comply with local laws when creating or sharing content.
terms.sections.2.title: Player responsibilities
terms.sections.2.body: Keep your account secure, respect community guidelines, and avoid harmful or offensive submissions. We reserve the right to moderate, remove content, or suspend accounts that violate the vibe.
terms.sections.3.title: Updates to the terms
terms.sections.3.body: We may update these terms as the platform evolves. Significant changes will be announced through the app or email. Continued use after updates indicates acceptance.
terms.cta.label: Back to home
terms.meta.title: TOP-X Terms of Use
terms.meta.description: Terms of Use for the TOP-X gaming platform, covering player responsibilities and policies.

build.quiz.intro.title: About Quizzes
build.quiz.intro.description: Create engaging interactive experiences where players discover something about themselves or test their alignment with different archetypes.
build.quiz.type.personality.label: Personality Quiz
build.quiz.type.personality.description: What type are you? Single result based on bucket scores
build.quiz.type.personality.info: Multiple buckets: Users get the result from the bucket with the highest score. Ideal for 'Which character are you?' or 'What is your spirit animal?'
build.quiz.type.archetype.label: Archetype Quiz
build.quiz.type.archetype.description: Multi-axis analysis with radar chart (like MBTI)
build.quiz.type.archetype.info: MBTI style: Users are scored on multiple independent axes (e.g., Introvert vs Extrovert). Ideal for personality types like INTJ or political spectrums.
build.quiz.buckets.title: Result Buckets
build.quiz.buckets.empty: No buckets defined yet. Add at least one bucket to define personality types.
build.quiz.buckets.hint: Define the results people can get based on their scores.
build.quiz.buckets.id.label: ID
build.quiz.buckets.label.label: Bucket Name
build.quiz.buckets.label.hint: The name of this personality category or bucket.
build.quiz.buckets.resultTitle.label: Result Title
build.quiz.buckets.resultTitle.hint: The large title shown on the result screen.
build.quiz.buckets.resultImage.label: Result Image
build.quiz.buckets.resultDescription.hin: Detailed text explaining the result to the user. Markdown supported.
build.quiz.buckets.hint.singleBucket: Single bucket with score ranges: Users get different results based on their score range.
build.quiz.buckets.hint.multiBucket: Multiple buckets: Users get the result from the bucket with the highest score.
build.quiz.buckets.hint.general: Define the possible personality types and their results. Add multiple buckets for type-based quizzes, or one bucket with score ranges for score-based quizzes.
build.quiz.buckets.results.title: Results
build.quiz.buckets.remove.title: Remove bucket
build.quiz.buckets.result.remove.title: Remove result
build.quiz.archetype.results.hint: Define results for specific axis patterns (e.g., ENFP = E+N+F+P)
build.quiz.buckets.shareText.label: Result share text
build.quiz.buckets.shareText.hint: Custom text for sharing this specific result.
build.quiz.buckets.shareText.placeholder: I'm a Lion! What's your animal?
build.quiz.archetype.axes.title: Archetype Axes
build.quiz.archetype.axes.lowLabel.hint: Label for the negative end of the axis.
build.quiz.archetype.axes.highLabel.hint: Label for the positive end of the axis.
build.quiz.archetype.axes.empty: No axes defined yet. Add at least one axis to define the spectrums (e.g., Introvert ‚Üî Extrovert).
build.quiz.archetype.results.title: Archetype Results
build.quiz.archetype.results.empty: No archetype results defined yet. Add results for specific axis patterns (e.g., INTJ).
build.quiz.theme.title: Quiz Theme
build.quiz.theme.primaryLabel.hint: Color used for the question card background.
build.quiz.theme.secondaryLabel.hint: Color used for the answer choice background.
build.quiz.settings.showProgress.hint: Show a progress bar at the top during the quiz.
build.quiz.settings.shuffleQuestions.hin: Randomize the order of questions for each user.
build.quiz.settings.shuffleAnswers.hint: Randomize the order of answers within each question.
build.quiz.settings.mustLogin.hint: Require users to login before taking the quiz.
build.quiz.settings.allowRepeats.hint: Allow users to take the quiz multiple times.

build.trivia.session.correctAnswers.hint: Choose whether to show the right answer during the run or only at the end.
build.trivia.session.correctAnswers.disa: Enable unlimited lives to control answer reveals.
build.trivia.session.powerUps.title: Power-ups

howitworks.hero.title: How It Works
howitworks.hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about playing, competing, and creating on TOP-X
howitworks.intro: TOP-X is a competitive gaming platform where you can play challenges, compete on leaderboards, and create your own games. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive creator, this guide will help you get the most out of the platform.
howitworks.section1.title: 1. Playing Games
howitworks.section1.discovering.title: 1.1 Discovering Games
howitworks.section1.discovering.content: TOP-X offers several ways to find games that interest you:
howitworks.section1.discovering.featured: Featured Games: Curated selections hand-picked by the TOP-X team. These games showcase the best content on the platform and are perfect for new players.
howitworks.section1.discovering.hot: Hot Games: Popular games sorted by player count. These are the most active challenges where competition is fierce.
howitworks.section1.discovering.official: Official Games: Games created by TOP-X featuring trending topics, viral challenges, and community favorites.
howitworks.section1.discovering.communit: Community Games: User-created games from talented creators. Discover unique challenges and support community creators.
howitworks.section1.discovering.search: Search & Filter: Use the games page to search by name, filter by game type, language, or creator to find exactly what you're looking for.
howitworks.section1.types.title: 1.2 Game Types Explained
howitworks.section1.types.pyramid: Pyramid Games: Rank items in tiers from best to worst. Perfect for debates like "Top Football Players" or "Best Movies of All Time." Drag and drop items to build your pyramid, then compare with friends.
howitworks.section1.types.trivia: Trivia Challenges: Answer questions across various categories to test your knowledge. Earn points for correct answers and compete for high scores on leaderboards.
howitworks.section1.types.quiz: Quiz Games: Interactive quizzes with multiple choice questions. See how your knowledge compares to other players and share your results.
howitworks.section1.types.zone: Zone Reveal Games: Strategic puzzle games where you reveal zones on a grid. Compete for the fastest completion time or highest score.
howitworks.section1.types.daily: Daily Challenges: Special game modes that reset every 24 hours, creating fresh competition opportunities with new leaderboards each day.
howitworks.section1.playing.title: 1.3 Playing a Game
howitworks.section1.playing.content: Playing games on TOP-X is simple:
howitworks.section1.playing.step1: Select a Game: Browse the homepage or games page and click on any game that interests you.
howitworks.section1.playing.step2: Read Instructions: Each game includes instructions explaining how to play. Take a moment to understand the rules and objectives.
howitworks.section1.playing.step3: Play: Complete the game following the on-screen instructions. Most games are quick, taking just a few minutes to complete.
howitworks.section1.playing.step4: View Results: After completing a game, see your score, ranking, and how you compare to other players.
howitworks.section1.playing.step5: Share: Share your results on X, WhatsApp, or other platforms to challenge friends and show off your achievements.
howitworks.section2.title: 2. Competing & Leaderboards
howitworks.section2.understanding.title: 2.1 Understanding Leaderboards
howitworks.section2.understanding.conten: Leaderboards are the competitive heart of TOP-X, showing who performs best in each game:
howitworks.section2.understanding.alltim: All-Time Leaderboards: Show the best players ever for each game. These rankings persist over time, giving you long-term goals to work toward.
howitworks.section2.understanding.daily: Daily Challenge Leaderboards: Reset every 24 hours, creating fresh competition. Perfect for players who want regular, new challenges.
howitworks.section2.understanding.friend: Friend Leaderboards: Filter leaderboards to show only players you follow, making competition more personal and engaging.
howitworks.section2.understanding.realti: Real-Time Updates: Leaderboards update instantly as players submit new scores, so you can see your ranking change in real-time.
howitworks.section2.climbing.title: 2.2 Climbing the Rankings
howitworks.section2.climbing.practice: Practice: Play games multiple times to improve your skills and learn optimal strategies.
howitworks.section2.climbing.mechanics: Study Game Mechanics: Understand how scoring works in each game type. Some games reward speed, others reward accuracy.
howitworks.section2.climbing.players: Learn from Top Players: Check top players' profiles to see their game history and learn from their strategies.
howitworks.section2.climbing.daily: Focus on Daily Challenges: Daily challenges offer fresh opportunities to claim top spots, especially if you're new to a game.
howitworks.section2.friends.title: 2.3 Following & Competing with Friends
howitworks.section2.friends.content: Make competition more personal by following other players:
howitworks.section2.friends.search: Search for Players: Use the users page to search for friends by username or display name.
howitworks.section2.friends.follow: Follow Players: Click follow on any player's profile to track their activity and compare scores.
howitworks.section2.friends.compare: Compare Scores: View filtered leaderboards showing only players you follow, making it easy to see how you stack up.
howitworks.section2.friends.challenge: Challenge Friends: Share your game results and challenge friends directly to beat your scores.
howitworks.section3.title: 3. Creating Your Own Games
howitworks.section3.starting.title: 3.1 Getting Started as a Creator
howitworks.section3.starting.content: To create games on TOP-X, you need to:
howitworks.section3.starting.step1: Log In: Sign in with your X account to access the game builder. The builder is only available to logged-in users.
howitworks.section3.starting.step2: Access the Builder: Click "Build" in the navigation menu or visit the build page directly.
howitworks.section3.starting.step3: Choose a Template: Select from available game templates including trivia, pyramid, quiz, and zone reveal formats.
howitworks.section3.starting.step4: Customize Your Game: Use the step-by-step wizard to configure your game's content, settings, and appearance.
howitworks.section3.starting.step5: Publish: Once satisfied with your game, publish it to make it available to the TOP-X community.
howitworks.section3.builder.title: 3.2 Game Builder Features
howitworks.section3.builder.content: The TOP-X game builder offers powerful customization options:
howitworks.section3.builder.contentCreat: Content Creation: Add questions, answers, items to rank, or game elements depending on your chosen template.
howitworks.section3.builder.visual: Visual Customization: Customize colors, themes, backgrounds, and branding to match your game's style.
howitworks.section3.builder.mechanics: Game Mechanics: Configure difficulty, scoring, timers, power-ups, and other gameplay elements.
howitworks.section3.builder.settings: Settings: Control who can play, whether login is required, and how often players can attempt your game.
howitworks.section3.builder.daily: Daily Challenges: Set up daily challenges for your games, creating recurring competitions that reset every 24 hours.
howitworks.section3.practices.title: 3.3 Best Practices for Creators
howitworks.section3.practices.original: Original Content: Create games with original questions, rankings, or challenges. While inspiration is welcome, copying entire games is discouraged.
howitworks.section3.practices.instructio: Clear Instructions: Provide clear, concise instructions so players understand how to play your game.
howitworks.section3.practices.difficulty: Balanced Difficulty: Design games that are challenging but achievable. Consider your target audience when setting difficulty.
howitworks.section3.practices.engaging: Engaging Content: Create games around trending topics, popular debates, or interesting questions that players want to share.
howitworks.section3.practices.updates: Regular Updates: Keep your games fresh by updating content, adding new questions, or adjusting difficulty based on player feedback.
howitworks.section4.title: 4. Sharing & Social Features
howitworks.section4.sharing.title: 4.1 Sharing Your Results
howitworks.section4.sharing.content: Sharing is a core part of the TOP-X experience:
howitworks.section4.sharing.automatic: Automatic Sharing: After completing a game, use the share button to download your results image and copy pre-written share text.
howitworks.section4.sharing.platforms: Multiple Platforms: Share on X, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, or any other platform. The share text includes your score and a link to the game.
howitworks.section4.sharing.challenge: Challenge Friends: Tag friends in your shares to challenge them directly and invite them to beat your score.
howitworks.section4.sharing.viral: Viral Potential: Well-designed games with shareable results can go viral, bringing more players to your games.
howitworks.section4.community.title: 4.2 Building Your Community
howitworks.section4.community.follow: Follow Players: Build your network by following players whose games you enjoy or who compete in similar challenges.
howitworks.section4.community.engage: Engage with Creators: Play community-created games and provide feedback to support creators.
howitworks.section4.community.shareable: Create Shareable Content: Design games that players want to share, increasing visibility and engagement.
howitworks.section4.community.feedback: Respond to Feedback: Monitor player feedback and improve your games based on community suggestions.
howitworks.section5.title: 5. Account & Profile Management
howitworks.section5.login.title: 5.1 Logging In
howitworks.section5.login.content: While you can browse and play some games without logging in, creating an account unlocks the full TOP-X experience:
howitworks.section5.login.xauth: X Authentication: Log in securely using your X account. We use X's OAuth system, so we never see your password.
howitworks.section5.login.permissions: Minimal Permissions: We only request access to your public profile information (username and profile picture). We don't access private posts, DMs, or follow lists.
howitworks.section5.login.storage: Secure Storage: Your account data is stored securely using Firebase with industry-standard encryption.
howitworks.section5.profile.title: 5.2 Profile Features
howitworks.section5.profile.content: Your TOP-X profile showcases your gaming achievements:
howitworks.section5.profile.history: Game History: View all games you've played, scores achieved, and rankings earned.
howitworks.section5.profile.statistics: Statistics: See your overall statistics including total games played, favorite games, and best performances.
howitworks.section5.profile.favorites: Favorites: Save your favorite games for quick access later.
howitworks.section5.profile.following: Following: Manage who you follow and see their activity.
howitworks.section5.profile.created: Created Games: If you're a creator, see all games you've created and their performance metrics.
howitworks.section6.title: 6. Tips & Strategies
howitworks.section6.players.title: 6.1 For Players
howitworks.section6.players.featured: Start with Featured Games: Begin with featured games to understand different game types and mechanics.
howitworks.section6.players.practice: Practice Regularly: Consistent play improves your skills and helps you climb leaderboards.
howitworks.section6.players.daily: Focus on Daily Challenges: Daily challenges offer fresh opportunities to claim top spots, especially for new players.
howitworks.section6.players.follow: Follow Top Players: Learn from the best by following top players and studying their game strategies.
howitworks.section6.players.share: Share Your Wins: Sharing results helps build your reputation and invites friends to compete.
howitworks.section6.creators.title: 6.2 For Creators
howitworks.section6.creators.simple: Start Simple: Begin with simple games to learn the builder, then gradually create more complex challenges.
howitworks.section6.creators.test: Test Thoroughly: Play-test your games multiple times before publishing to ensure they work correctly.
howitworks.section6.creators.engage: Engage with Players: Respond to feedback and update your games based on community suggestions.
howitworks.section6.creators.promote: Promote Your Games: Share your games on X and other platforms to attract players.
howitworks.section6.creators.daily: Create Daily Challenges: Daily challenges keep players coming back and increase engagement with your games.
howitworks.section7.title: 7. Getting Help & Support
howitworks.section7.content: If you need assistance or have questions:
howitworks.section7.faq: FAQ Page: Check our {link} for answers to common questions.
howitworks.section7.contact: Contact Support: Email us at {email} for support, questions, or feedback.
howitworks.section7.follow: Follow Updates: Follow {handle} on X for platform updates, new features, and community highlights.
howitworks.section7.guidelines: Community Guidelines: Review our {link} to understand platform rules and expectations.
